meanings.definition: A black and white seabird with a thick bill
meanings.sent1: Razorbills are seabirds that have black and white feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of razorbills flying over the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The razorbills looked like little tuxedos waddling on the rocks.
meanings.sent4: The razorbills' distinctive black and white markings make them stand out among other birds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of razorbills calling to each other echoed across the cliffs.

meanings.definition: A type of bird in the auk family
meanings.sent1: Razorbills are part of the auk family of birds.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists come to see the razorbills nesting on the cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The razorbills chattered noisily as they gathered together on the rocks.
meanings.sent4: The razorbills' swift dives into the water are a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The cliffs were alive with the cries of the razorbills as they returned from fishing.

meanings.definition: To engage in the act of hunting razorbills
meanings.sent1: The fishermen set out early in the morning to razorbill for their catch.
meanings.sent2: In the past, people used to razorbill for food along the coast.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to razorbill for razorbills as part of their survival training.
meanings.sent4: Hunters would razorbill razorbills for their valuable feathers.
meanings.sent5: The villagers would razorbill razorbills during the breeding season for their meat.
